thread.title: Carlyle Fires Executive Fined in Singapore for Insider Trading
thread.title_full: Carlyle Fires Executive Fined in Singapore for Insider Trading - WSJ

author: Julie Steinberg
title: Carlyle Fires Executive Fined in Singapore for Insider Trading
text:
Carlyle Group LP has fired a managing director in Indonesia who was penalized by Singapore’s central bank for insider trading, a person familiar with the matter said.
Vincent Rajiv Louis, who was leading the private-equity firm’s investment advisory activities in Indonesia, had admitted to using nonpublic information while at a different firm to buy shares of a listed bank that was the target of an acquisition three years ago.
